players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I'm still investigating Alice's death. No one has confessed to it yet."

Diana: "I have found out that Bob is the mafioso. He remains silent, which fits his role. Charlie is still investigating, so he might be a villager trying to solve the case. I suggest we keep an eye on Bob and continue our investigation."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
